channel.title: Teaching on Neil Ryan
channel.description: Recent content in Teaching on Neil Ryan

item.title: Teaching Statement -- In progress
item.description: As I’ve been pivoting from Computer Architecture research to Computing Education research, I’ve been doing my best to interrogate myself about what feels unique about this specific move in my life, as well what excites me, and what challenges me. At some point in the future, I’ll write up some of the reflections here.
